mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_datapoint (value, createdAt, sensorId) VALUES (#{value}, #{createdAt}, #{sensorId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_datapoint WHERE sensorId = #{sensorId} ORDER BY createdAt ASC
SELECT * FROM t_datapoint WHERE sensorId = #{sensorId} AND (createdAt BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}) ORDER BY createdAt ASC
SELECT * FROM t_datapoint WHERE createdAt <= #{createdAt} AND sensorId = #{sensorId} LIMIT 0, 1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_datapoint WHERE createdAt = #{createdAt} AND sensorId = #{sensorId}
